rev.comment: link to [[T-4]] not really necessary; I don't think anyone will accidently type "T-4 Euthanasia Program" when they really want the IATA code for Hellas Jet airline

'''T-4 Euthanasia Program''' ('''TiergartenstraÃe 4''' or '''Tiergartenstrasse 4''') was the official name of the [[Nazi Germany]] [[eugenics]] program which forcefully conducted mass [[Compulsory_sterilization#Germany|sterilizations]] and [[euthanasia]] on Germans who were institutionalized or suffering from birth defects. In total, an estimated 200,000 people were killed as a result of the program.
'''T-4 Euthanasia Program''' ('''TiergartenstraÃe 4''' or '''Tiergartenstrasse 4''') was the official name of the [[Nazi Germany]] [[eugenics]] program which forcefully conducted mass [[Compulsory_sterilization#Germany|sterilizations]] and [[euthanasia]] on Germans who were institutionalized or suffering from birth defects. In total, an estimated 200,000 people were killed as a result of the program.
